Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis RIMD0225014 (MIC=2.5 µg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus IID1677 (MRSA) (MIC=20.0 µg/ml), Listeria monocytogenes VIU206 (MIC=40.0 µg/ml).Gram-negative bacteria:Haemophilus influenzae IID983 (MIC=5.0 µg/ml), V. vulnificus RIMD2219009 (MIC=5.0 µg/ml), Escherichia coli JM109 (MIC=20.0 µg/ml), E. coli DH5Î± (MIC=40.0 µg/ml).Fungi:Candida albicans ATCC36232, Candida tropicalis TIMM0313, S. pombe IFO1628, Saccharomyces cerevisiae A581A.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial activity against Gram-negative bacteria and Gram-positive bacteria. Also possesses antifungal activity.
Sequence Information.PTM: Contains two disulfide bonds. Up to two of the methionines may be oxidized to methionine sulfoxides.

Literature.Title: A novel antimicrobial peptide from the sea hare Dolabella auricularia.
Literature.Author: Iijima R, Kisugi J, Yamazaki M.
